name: Lewd City Girls
notes: You must download the game at the official website.

game.exe: drive_c/Lewd City Girls 1.0.1 PC/Lewd City Girls.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the itch.io archive
game:
  exe: drive_c/Lewd City Girls 1.0.1 PC/Lewd City Girls.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: GrabFullScreen
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: Y
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c
    file: $file1
